title: Wohoooooo! Nice work!

embed.description: Explore the world of League of Legends through an interactive map of Runeterra.

body:
People have been asking for a map for aaaaaaaaaages!
And it did not disappoint!

Well done universe team!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
I have noticed a problem
In Ionia, there is no place for the vastayans, and Xayah and Rakan mention a "Great Magical City"?
Wow for once this guy isn't writing essays on why this meta is screwed {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
where the fuck did 3s go and that other gametype with the point style system and a slightly different resolution go? damn that was fun, scary, but fun!
